6.heading: Emancipation.
6.title: "Deacon Johnson"
6.author: by J
6.appears_in: A. Rogers ; illustrated by Samuel Milai.
notes: Divided panel with items on musician Deacon Johnson, American slaves as skilled workers, Pushkin, and Caroline Hixon who was held a slave for 39 years after emancipation.
From microfilm of the Pittsburgh Courier.
"Copyright 1934" appears in the logo, but does not date the individual appearances of this feature.
